user.name: Parthiv Akbari
user.bio: Passionate Software Engineer | Master's in Applied Computer Science | Java, C++, Python Expert | Agile Practitioner | AI Enthusiast | Leader & Collaborator

node.name: afiliyo_web_app
node.description: This platform aggregates popular products from various platforms, converting them into affiliate links within the Afilio market. It scrapes, converts, and manages affiliate links using Node.js, Express, MySQL, and Angular, simplifying affiliate marketing processes.

node.name: kukadia-ERP
node.description: An ERP system tailored for the diamond and jewelry industry, utilizing Node.js, Express, MySQL, and Angular. It efficiently manages various aspects of the industry, ensuring organized operations and user-friendly interfaces.

node.name: rate-my-fitness
node.description: Designed for gym management, it handles fitness routines, diet plans, exercise regimens, and gym locations. Utilizing Node.js, Express, MySQL, and Angular, it offers a comprehensive solution for fitness enthusiasts.

node.name: Striliant
node.description: An extension of the Kukadia ERP, focusing on administrative and buyer panels within the diamond and jewelry sector. It maintains the same code structure while enhancing management capabilities for administrators and buyers.

node.name: RedditLytics-Team-Horizon
node.description: Redditlytics is a Java-based project utilizing Akka and Akka Test frameworks to perform synchronous extraction of Reddit posts. It conducts sentiment analysis on each post individually and is structured around Java, Akka actors, JUnit, and JavaScript for specific functionalities.

node.name: AGV
node.description: The most modern approach makes use of a Unit load carrier called “Automated Guided Vehicle”. Guiding paths are used to guide AGV from source to destination.
